alert.note: Alert for Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dillon and east central Marlboro Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 524 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Minturn, or 10 miles northwest of Dillon. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clio, Bingham, Dunbar, Minturn and Little Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
